[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IHeftTaskFileOperations](./heft.ihefttaskfileoperations.md) &gt; [copyOperations](./heft.ihefttaskfileoperations.copyoperations.md)

## IHeftTaskFileOperations.copyOperations property

Copy operations to be performed following the `run` or `runIncremental` hook. These operations will be performed after the task `run` or `runIncremental` hook has completed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
copyOperations: Set<ICopyOperation>;
```
